committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate April 24, 1975, as National Day of Remembrance of Man's Inhumanity to Man.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate April 24, 1975, as "National Day of Remembrance of Man's Inhumanity to Man" for remembrance of all the victims of genocide, especially those of Armenian ancestry who succumbed to the genocide perpetrated in Turkey in 1915.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate April 24, 1975, as National Day of Remembrance of Man's Inhumanity to Man.
